exceptions.exn: The LHS of pairmap_map (pairmap _ (_ _) [seq _ i | i <- _]) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment T : Type T0 : Type f : T -> T0 f1 : R -> T P : seq R H : forall (f : T0 -> T0 -> T0) (g : T0 -> T0) (s : seq T0) (x0 : T0), pairmap f (g x0) [seq g i | i <- s] = pairmap (fun x y : T0 => f (g x) (g y)) x0 s Unable to unify "{| SF_h := head 0 P; SF_t := pairmap (fun x y : R => (y, f (f1 x))) (head 0 P) (behead P) |}" with "{| SF_h := head 0 P; SF_t := [seq (fst x, f (snd x)) | x <- pairmap (fun x y : R => (y, f1 x)) (head 0 P) (behead P)] |}".

original: unfold SF_map, SF_seq_f1. simpl. rewrite pairmap_map. reflexivity.
